import { Col, Button ,Card} from "react-bootstrap" import Bar from "../../HookCustom/FilterNumbr" import './CardP.css' import { useShopingCard } from "../../context/Shopping" const CardP = ({item}) => { const {getItemq,incressCars,decressCars,removeItem,text } = useShopingCard(); const quantity = getItemq(item.id); return ( {item.name} {Bar(item.price)}
{quantity === 1 ? : (
{quantity } in cart
) }
) } export default CardP
